--- Reviewed 2 of 2 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, all discussions resolved. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-:-L5Yxfow5mjU6uqOcx-j:b-jbsf8z)*

with a few style nits. Mostly comments that don't add any value. --- Reviewed 2 of 2 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 10 unresolved discussions, some commit checks pending. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1504 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5YyS3OmnXmt8oWOU6f:-L5YyS3OmnXmt8oWOU6g:b-1dc8sw) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1504)):* > ```C > } > > int32_t max_s32(int32_t a, int32_t b) > ``` This can be static. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1509 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5Yyx4WvzZsFKZ3AlIj:-L5Yyx4WvzZsFKZ3AlIk:b-1dc8sw) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1509)):* > ```C > } > > uint16_t min_u16(uint16_t a, uint16_t b) > ``` This can be static. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1536 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5Yz6kIYgt8VufI02LI:-L5Yz6kIYgt8VufI02LJ:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1536)):* > ```C > bool any_active_fts = false; > > // HINT: iterate over all possible FTs > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1540 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5YzA5E_5OdhRqwfeoj:-L5YzA5E_5OdhRqwfeok:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1540)):* > ```C > struct File_Transfers *const ft = &friendcon->file_sending[i]; > > // HINT: is this an active FT? > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1545 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5YzBnqrgDGUYV1H7X9:-L5YzBnqrgDGUYV1H7XA:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1545)):* > ```C > --num; > > // HINT: is FT complete? > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1557 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5YzJ0Ceiy5jHA9xUop:-L5YzJ0Ceiy5jHA9xUoq:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1557)):* > ```C > } > > // HINT: decrease free slots by the number of slots this FT uses > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1558 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5YzOZbxgfz0ybzLhMS:-L5YzOZbxgfz0ybzLhMT:b-kps5ve) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1558)):* > ```C > > // HINT: decrease free slots by the number of slots this FT uses > *free_slots = max_s32(0, (int32_t) * free_slots - ft->slots_allocated); > ``` `(int32_t) * free_slots - ft->slots_allocated` looks odd. Maybe `(int32_t)*free_slots - ft->slots_allocated`? It seems to more in line with how we do dereferencing and casts elsewhere in the code. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1608 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5Z-7k-2U6-oqfJbOr4:-L5Z-7k-2U6-oqfJbOr5:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1608)):* > ```C > static void do_reqchunk_filecb(Messenger *m, int32_t friendnumber, void *userdata) > { > // HINT: no files to send > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1621 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5Z-WI-oAqLq4NSD2VN:-L5Z-WI-oAqLq4NSD2VO:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1621)):* > ```C > m->friendlist[friendnumber].friendcon_id)); > > // HINT: need to keep "MIN_SLOTS_FREE" slots always free > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *[toxcore/Messenger.c, line 1626 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-L5Z-Vq1xFEo7h-nrdVK:-L5Z-Vq1xFEo7h-nrdVL:b-7bnv3j) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/c-toxcore/blob/742a15bac1d90b3799ab4d5552f95d05b5da576c/toxcore/Messenger.c#L1626)):* > ```C > bool any_active_fts = true; > uint32_t loop_counter = 0; > // HINT: maximum number of Filetransfer loops > ``` This comment isn't really needed. --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/765#-:-L5Z-duiuAmWwH5YcM7I:b-f6i3ws)*

commit.message:
Make outgoing Filetransfers round-robin.

Instead of 1 FT blocking all others.
